description:
BOOM - MASSIVE GROWTH WEEK

WHAT IS IT?
One-week growth bootcamp. A 5-day journey through marketing & sales.
We are bringing together the startup founders, marketers, growth practitioners and salespeople to share their learned lessons and tips so that YOU can boost your business growth.

HOW DOES IT WORK?
5 days / 25 workshops / 25 speakers 

- DAY 1 (19 March): Getting the basics right @ ANJE
- DAY 2 (20 March): Awareness & Education @ Porto Design Factory
- DAY 3 (21 March): Nurturing & Conversion @ UPTEC
- DAY 4 (22 March): Sales Development @ Founders Founders
- DAY 5 (23 March): Customer Success and Referrals @ Palácio das Artes by ScaleUp Porto

If you can handle a one-week growth bootcamp challenge, we’re happy to have you on board for this journey. Be ready for an intense shot of marketing & sales know-how.

The whole week is too much for you? No problem, joins us for a day or two, and focus only on the specific parts of the marketing & sales process that interest you.

WHO IS THIS EVENT FOR?
- Startup founders & CEOs
- Startup’s marketing & sales teams
- Marketeers
- Future-to-be entrepreneurs

WHAT DOES THE TICKET INCLUDE?
The ticket includes access to the daily lectures, coffee breaks, lunches, workshop materials after the event (presentations, videos, photos) & formation certification.


MORE INFO ABOUT THE EVENT: http://www.theboomweek.com/
name: BOOM - Massive Growth Week
